T02D2999:60a-0: @60a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2999:60a-1: klu chen po rnams kyi sprin dral ba'i cho ga
T02D2999:60a-2: bsgrub par 'dod pas bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par
T02D2999:60a-3: 'joms pa dmar por bsgyur la snying po bsdus pa'i
T02D2999:60a-4: sngags bzlas te / yungs kar la klu chen po rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bur dmigs te /
T02D2999:60a-5: nam mkha' la gtor bas klu rnams kyi snying gnas
T02D2999:60a-6: phu: zhes pa'i yi ge grangs med pa 'phros pas
T02D2999:60a-7: sprin gyi tshogs rnam par bshigs te /
T02D2999:60a-8: nam mkha' rang dangs su song bar dmigs so //
T02D2999:60a-9: bdag nyid rdo rje chen po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas sdigs mdzub bsgrengs te /
T02D2999:60a-10: khro bo'i sdang mig bzlog la sngags zlos shing mdzub ris bya /
T02D2999:60a-11: kha nas me'i 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros
T02D2999:60a-12: pas bar snang thams cad med dpung gis khengs par
T02D2999:60a-13: dmigs so // gang bsrung ba'i phyogs su phur bul khro bo bcur dmigs la gdab bo //
T02D2999:60a-14: sems can bsrung ba'i las sprin dral ba'i 'byung ba gcod byed ces bya ba /
